channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description:
Ok, I have searched all I can and CANNOT find a Tut or ANYTHING!!
When I add items to my shop npc/shopkeeper or even when i try to use ::pickup, it displays the item name as null. when I drop the item it displays as a huge Dwarves head can someone please help me to fix it? I know it's NOT the wrong item ID for starters!!
Pease Post/Reply A.S.A.P.!!!
Thnaks, Varii
